t: Amazon.com: Misono Chef's Knife - 8 inch: Chefs Knives: Home & Kitchen
s: I had to chop some bermuda onions ... try the Misono. My, what a pleasure to use this knife. I do not care for the term "like a hot knife through butter" but this knife cuts effortlessly, and I plan to use it whenever I can. I hope this helps anyone who may be looking for an excellent knife and is turned off by the high prices of the better known brands...

s: November 24, 2024 - If you're left handed, worry not: you can custom order a left-handed knife from Misono. Not from Amazon, but there are several sellers who offer this option at a reasonable price, usually about $20 extra for common blades like the gyuto, santoku, and petty.
